overview:
Korhan Kurt, the co-founder of the digital marketing agency Promoqube, Workattack, Base and Zumbara.

He leads projects related to new marketing technology development.

Interested about; social media, facebook, social media marketing, lean startup, strategy, strategic planning, pricing, new media, social networking, innovation, social marketing, planning for good, likemind, facebook marketing, analytics

Promoqube, the company he has helped build, is an innovation center that knows social networks inside and out and gets effective results. Being the first Turkish agency to be included in Facebook’s PDC Program; Promoqube follows innovations and guides the competitors. Some of Promoqube’s creations include new marketing tools such as Sense digital PR platform, campaign platform and winneRTweet.
